beats.label: HOOK + PROMISE
beats.narration: Should you race Spotted Horse Ultra? I rated 328 gravel races on 14 dimensions. Spotted Horse Ultra scored 56 out of 100. Solid tier. Here's what that actually means for your season.
beats.text_on_screen: Should You Race Spotted Horse Ultra?
beats.editing_note: STATE THE PREMISE IN 8 SECONDS. Clear value prop: 'I rated 328 races. Here's where this one lands.' This is the 8-second decision window. Viewers who stay past 15s are 58% more likely to finish.
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) + IKEA effect (viewer predicts the tier before reveal).

beats.label: THE COURSE
beats.narration: Spotted Horse Ultra. Iowa. 150 mi. Iowa prairie ultra-endurance gravel.
beats.editing_note: Let the course breathe. Show the route map, then cut to terrain-specific B-roll. This is the SETUP phase — grounding the viewer before the data analysis. Pacing: 25-40 sec cuts.

beats.label: THE SCORES — Top 8
beats.narration: Time to break down the scorecard. Length. 5 out of 5. Ultra distance. Bring lights and a plan. Experience. 4 out of 5. Genuinely unique. Hard to replicate. 150 miles through Iowa's rolling hills delivers suffering without the circus. Value. 4 out of 5. Strong value proposition. Entry fees unavailable in research, but the no-frills approach suggests typical Iowa pricing well under $150. Logistics. 3 out of 5. Gets the job done. Nothing fancy. Elevation. 3 out of 5. Proper climbing. You'll earn your descents. Kate Geisen encountered "a virtual gravel wall" climb where she was "pretty excited to make it to the top without having to walk. Adventure. 3 out of 5. Genuine adventure elements. Expect the unexpected. Self-supported navigation through unmarked Iowa farm roads creates real adventure without wilderness risk. Community. 3 out of 5. Good vibes. Riders actually talk to each other. Expenses. 3 out of 5. Standard gravel race budget.
beats.editing_note: PROGRESSIVE RHYTHM: start tight (15-20 sec per dimension), slow down for the most interesting scores (30-40 sec). Each score: number appears, brief pause, explanation. Avatar reacts to extreme scores (5/5 = chef_kiss, 1/5 = facepalm). RE-ENGAGEMENT at 3:00 mark: insert a surprising score reveal or a meme reaction to break the pattern.

meme_insert.suggested_clip: avatar reaction to most extreme score

beats.label: THE SCORES — Also Scored
beats.narration: And the rest of the scorecard. Technicality. 2 out of 5. Mild technical demands. Pick decent tires. Climate. 2 out of 5. Mostly pleasant. Check the forecast anyway. Prestige. 2 out of 5. Regional reputation. The locals know. Race Quality. 2 out of 5. Nothing special about the race execution. Field Depth. 2 out of 5. Enough competition to keep you honest. Altitude. 1 out of 5. Sea level. Your lungs get a day off.
beats.editing_note: FAST PACING — 7 seconds per dimension. Quick-fire energy change from the deep analysis above. This is a PATTERN INTERRUPT through pacing shift.

beats.narration: Verdict: Iowa Prairie Ultra-Endurance. If you're in the Midwest. yes, it's solid. If you're international. there are better options.
